con:property.con:name: currentDay
con:property.con:value: ${=import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); cal.add(Calendar.DATE, 0); new SimpleDateFormat("YYMMdd").format(cal.getTime());}

con:property.con:name: previousDay
con:property.con:value: ${=import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); cal.add(Calendar.DATE, -1); new SimpleDateFormat("YYMMdd").format(cal.getTime());}

con:property.con:name: authorizationDate
con:property.con:value: ${=import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance(); cal.add(Calendar.DATE, -1); new SimpleDateFormat("YYYY-MM-dd").format(cal.getTime());}

con:property.con:name: getData_Original
con:property.con:value: SELECT ORDER_ID,RCNCL_ID,PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE,ORGNTG_SYS_CDE FROM PYMT_TRNSCTN WHERE ORDER_ID IN (SELECT PYMT_TRNSCTN.ORDER_ID FROM PYMT_TRNSCTN,BLC_ORDER WHERE BLC_ORDER.EMAIL_ADDRESS LIKE 'ss__________@mail.com' AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_STATUS = 'SUBMITTED' AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = PYMT_TRNSCTN.ORDER_ID AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.PYMT_TRNSCTN_STS_CDE = 'X' AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE IS NULL AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.CCPS_SEQ_NO IS NULL AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.RCNCL_ID IS NOT NULL MINUS SELECT ORDER_ID FROM PYMT_TRNSCTN WHERE PYMT_TRNSCTN_TYP_CDE = 'CHBK' OR PYMT_TRNSCTN_TYP_CDE = 'RCHBK' ) ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC

con:property.con:name: getData_Original_LocalCurrency
con:property.con:value: SELECT ORDER_ID,RCNCL_ID,PRSNTMNT_FGN_EXCHG_RT,REPLACE(PRSNTMNT_AMT,'.','') AS PRSNTMNT_AMT,PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE,ORGNTG_SYS_CDE FROM PYMT_TRNSCTN WHERE ORDER_ID IN (SELECT PYMT_TRNSCTN.ORDER_ID FROM PYMT_TRNSCTN,BLC_ORDER WHERE BLC_ORDER.EMAIL_ADDRESS LIKE 'ss__________@mail.com' AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_STATUS = 'SUBMITTED' AND BLC_ORDER.ORDER_ID = PYMT_TRNSCTN.ORDER_ID AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.PYMT_TRNSCTN_STS_CDE = 'X' AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.PRSNTMNT_CRNCY_CDE = '${DataSourceCurrency#currencyCode}' AND PYMT_TRNSCTN.CCPS_SEQ_NO IS NULL MINUS SELECT ORDER_ID FROM PYMT_TRNSCTN WHERE PYMT_TRNSCTN_TYP_CDE = 'CHBK' OR PYMT_TRNSCTN_TYP_CDE = 'RCHBK' ) ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC
